caption.p: The long-term operation of LGA3 and CALB at different conditions. a The temperature dependence of turnover numbers of LGA3 and CALB at A w = 0 and A w = 0.34; b– e the thermostability of LGA3 and CALB at A w = 0 and A w = 0.34 at 20, 40, 60, and 80 °C; f the activity of LGA3 during a continuous operation for 500 h at 20 °C. Error bars represent the s.d. of three replicates. Source data are provided as a Source Data file
